mapper.sql: select pm.per_member_no member_no, m.name, m.nickname, m.email, m.tel, m.photo, m.created_dt, m.active, m.status from member m join per_member pm on m.member_no=pm.member_no
mapper.select: select pm.per_member_no member_no, m.nickname, m.email, m.active from member m join per_member pm on m.member_no=pm.member_no where email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update member set name=#{perName} where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
update member set nickname=#{perNickname} where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
update member set photo=#{perPhoto} where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
update member set tel=#{perTel} where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
update member set email=#{perEmail} where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
update member set password=password(#{perPassword}) where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
update member set active=2 where member_no= (select member_no from per_member where per_member_no=#{perNo})
